TEXT.TITLE: FRENCH MARCH UNEMPLOYMENT RISES TO RECORD 11.1 PCT
TEXT.BODY: France's seasonally adjusted unemployment rate rose to a record 11.1 pct of the workforce at end-March compared with 11 pct at end-February, the National Statistics Institute (INSEE) said. The total number of unemployed edged up to 2.67 mln at end-March from 2.65 mln at end-February, an INSEE spokeswoman said. REUTER
